co.lqnt.lockbox.key

Class KeyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.lqnt.lockbox.key.KeyFactory

  • public class KeyFactory
extends Object
    Creates encryption keys.

      • KeyFactory

        public KeyFactory(PemParserFactoryInterface pemParserFactory,
          BcKeyParametersFactoryInterface bcPublicKeyParametersFactory,
          org.bouncycastle.openssl.jcajce.JcePEMDecryptorProviderBuilder pemDecryptorProviderBuilder,
          org.bouncycastle.openssl.jcajce.JceOpenSSLPKCS8DecryptorProviderBuilder pkcs8DecryptorProviderBuilder,
          org.bouncycastle.crypto.AsymmetricCipherKeyPairGenerator keyGenerator,
          SecureRandomInterface random)
        Construct a new key factory.
        Parameters:
        pemParserFactory - The PEM parser factory to use.
        bcPublicKeyParametersFactory - The public key parameters factory to use.
        pemDecryptorProviderBuilder - The PEM decryptor provider builder to use.
        pkcs8DecryptorProviderBuilder - The PKCS #8 decryptor provider builder to use.
        keyGenerator - The key generator to use.
        random - The secure random generator to use.
